name: Räserbajs
description: '''Räserbajs''' was a [[Sweden|Swedish]] [[punk rock]] band formed in 1990 in [[Alingsås]] by Richard Stark and Erik Hjortstam. They released many singles but only one album, ''[[Noppriga tights och moonboots]]'' from 1995. The band also appeared on numerous compilation albums. The lyrics were sometimes childish and dirty and sometimes political. They disbanded in 1997.
